title: Is it permissible to look at & edit women in street dawah video to blur them out Assim al hakeem
transcript: I'm sure if someone wants to edit a recording of a street tower that is put to be upload on YouTube in the end but he wants to censor the women's that are passing by on the street and in order to put the censorship that is blurred to be put on the woman he may have to look at the woman because I don't know if it's possible to lower the Gaze and also putting the censorship on the woman that would be fit while she's going so is it permissible to look at her for a few moments so that the center is being put rightly on her this is permissible inshallah due to your necessity such editing and looking is not intended for itself and as long as a person does not fear any Fitness upon himself and he does this while feeding Allah to the best of his ability there is nothing wrong in that inshallah
